title: 08/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to breaking news out of the NFL: Carson Wentz will be out 5-12 weeks due to a foot injury and what this means for their hopes of contending for another Super Bowl. He explains why one veteran quarterback who the Colts are rumored to target as a replacement for Wentz doesn't make any sense. He tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Kawhi Leonard. Plus, Pro Bowl WR T. J. Houshmandzadeh joins the show to discuss the Colts and what they should do at quarterback after Wentz's injury.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
